Graphics¶

This module is the biggest of them all! It contains functions that interact with the Vulkan rendering API with very little abstraction.

State¶

typedef struct DCgState DCgState¶

This structure contains the data the graphics module functions need to work. Its members are an implementation detail and are defined in the dcore/graphics/internal.h header file.

DCgState *dcgNewState()¶

Creates and allocates a graphics state

void dcgInit(DCgState *s, uint32_t appVersion, const char *appName)¶

Initializes a graphics state.

Parameters:

  • appVersion – client version.

  • appName – client name.

void dcgDeinit(DCgState *s)¶

Deinitializes a graphics state.

void dcgFreeState(DCgState *state)¶

Frees a graphics state.
